Posts.Content: Musiclover1990 wrote: so after trying to get in with my GP for the last week to no avail I finally decided just to go to a walk-in clinic about the breast lump because in the last week it one half of my breast has gotten all swollen and red and very hot to the touch and the lump has not gone away The clinic doctor examined me and felt I for sure need an Ultrasound as soon as possible so he called over to an ultrasound place and they got me in for tomorrow at 3:10 I'm so nervous I feel like it's likely not cancer because I'm only 28 But I have also gotten other rare things in my life My family's joke is that if it's a rare it's more likely i have it then it is if it's common, I'm trying not to stress and just take it day by day I guess tomorrow iwill at least be on the road answer The doctor also put me on an anabiotic said with this type of inflammation and redness it may be infection Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ultrasound tomorrow ( sorry for spelling im dyslexic ) Musiclover1990 vampeyes

Posts.Content: Musiclover1990 wrote: hi im 28 years old , about three months ago i notice Lumps not directly in breast in pec muscle directly above right breast it not one lump but almost like a cluster of lumps attached to eachother after Discovering this lump ( and googling myself crazy) i tried to stay calm thank God i happen to have an appointment with my gp the following day regarding my on going lupus treatments so i thought i would just mention it to her she did not seem concerned. She did not even do an Exam or even look at my breast she told to Pay attention to if they change through out My cycle and that if i was still concerned she would examine me at my next appointment which is This September so i left feeling calmer and pushed it to the back burner until now cause tonight while standing in front the mirror before my shower i could slightly see the cluster of lumps then i place hand on the back of my head the way I always have done for myself exam and i could see the lumps so clearly it looked like about 5 rocks with rough edges all together then i did it to the other side no visible lumps but on feeling i felt one single lump near my armpit the had the rock like feeling . My husband was very concerned and feels i need to call my doctor tomorrow im just thinking maybe when i described it to my doctor she knew it was nothing to be concerned about and maybe I'm just being a worry wort is it worth getting seen sooner ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not sure if i should worry? Musiclover1990 Musiclover1990
